InstalledItem.Name: Tigerstrike T-19P
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Kruger Intergalactic
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 2

A custom variant on Kruger Intergalactic’s Tigerstrike line of rotary cannons, this powerful gun was designed in conjunction with the team working on the P-52 Merlin to ensure that it fit seamlessly with the graceful lines of light fighter’s hull while still rapidly delivering round after round with the dependability that one expects from a Kruger weapon.

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S1 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 1

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. This special VariPuck will accept any weapon the same size as the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-117 Bulldog Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 1

Featuring a three-barrel sequential fire design, the Klaus & Werner CF-117 Bulldog laser repeater is capable of delivering high velocity energy rounds while maintaining heat efficiency making it a favorite among new pilots who are outfitting their first ship.

InstalledItem.Name: SecureHyde
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Military

Get extra protection with the SecureHyde shield generator. This military-grade component provides superior durability over every other shield generator in its class.

InstalledItem.Name: LightBlossom
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Sakura Sun
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Featuring stylish design and strong performance, the LightBlossom is a worthy addition to Sakura Sun’s line-up, continuing the reputation the conglomerate has for making everything and making it well.

InstalledItem.Name: Frost-Star
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: J-Span 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Noted for its consistent performance, the Frost-Star cooler from J-Span has many admirers for its well-balanced power to heat ratio.

InstalledItem.Description:

Class: Civilian

With the Denning, you can now equip an award winning WillsOp radar to your vehicle.
